title: "Here's how Americans view facial recognition and driverless cars"
excerpt: "The nonpartisan Pew Research Center surveyed more than 10,000 adults and found that their support of artificial intelligence varied, depending on its use. Police use of facial recognition? More people say it's a good idea than not. Driverless cars?"
